class.name: wxSlider
class.description:
A slider is a control with a handle which can be pulled back and forth to change the value.

On Windows, the track bar control is used.

Slider events are handled in the same way as a scrollbar.

flag.name: wxSL_HORIZONTAL
flag.description: Displays the slider horizontally (this is the default).

flag.name: wxSL_MIN_MAX_LABELS
flag.description: Displays minimum, maximum labels (new since wxWidgets 2.9.1).

flag.name: wxSL_LABELS
flag.description: Displays minimum, maximum and value labels (same as wxSL_VALUE_LABEL and wxSL_MIN_MAX_LABELS together).

flag.name: wxSL_LEFT
flag.description: Displays ticks on the left and forces the slider to be vertical.

flag.name: wxSL_RIGHT
flag.description: Displays ticks on the right and forces the slider to be vertical.

flag.name: wxSL_BOTTOM
flag.description: Displays ticks on the bottom (this is the default).

flag.name: wxSL_SELRANGE
flag.description: Allows the user to select a range on the slider. Windows only.

flag.name: wxSL_INVERSE
flag.description: Inverses the minimum and maximum endpoints on the slider. Not compatible with wxSL_SELRANGE.

int.name: pagesize
int.label: Page size
int.description: Page size; number of steps the slider moves when the user moves pages up or down (default: unset).

int.name: linesize
int.label: Line size
int.description: Line size; number of steps the slider moves when the user moves it up or down a line (default: unset).

int.name: tickfreq
int.label: Tick marks frequency
int.description: Tick marks frequency (Windows only; default: unset).

int.name: selmin
int.label: Selection start
int.description: Selection start position (Windows only; default: unset).

int.name: selmax
int.label: Selection end
int.description: Selection end position (Windows only; default: unset).

type.name: wxEVT_SCROLL_THUMBTRACK
type.description: Process wxEVT_SCROLL_THUMBTRACK thumbtrack events (frequent events sent as the user drags the thumbtrack).

type.name: wxEVT_SCROLL_CHANGED
type.description: Process wxEVT_SCROLL_CHANGED end of scrolling events (MSW only).

type.name: wxEVT_COMMAND_SLIDER_UPDATED
type.description: Process wxEVT_COMMAND_SLIDER_UPDATED which is generated after any change of wxSlider position in addition to one of the events above.
